Uses [Jekyll](https://jekyllrb.com/) hosted on [GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com/)

# Getting Started

Ruby and rubygems already installed:

    gem install bundler
    bundle

# Development 

To start a local server: `jekyll serve`

# Deploying

    ./script/deploy.sh

https://content.nathanorick.com/weddings/sample/
